author: Xerbutri
title: Line 154: Dinant - Givet
intro: I visited a part of this line back in the summer of 2002. In August 2008 I made another cycling trip, and I had to visit this railway. The tracks are still here and it is a beuatiful area to cycle through.
history: The railway was opened in 1863. Between 1988 and 1989 it closed. It reopened in 1990 for museum purposes, and closed again in 2000.
